description: 스틱맨(Stickman) 캐릭터 이미지 생성 가이드 - 실사 인물 사용 금지

characterStyle.description: 모든 인물은 스틱맨으로만 표현 - 실사 인물 절대 금지!
characterStyle.warning: ⚠️ 할아버지, 할머니, 노인, 실제 사람 얼굴 생성 절대 금지!
characterStyle.stickman: Simple white stickman character with round head, two black dot eyes, small mouth, thin eyebrows, black outline body

emotions.happy: curved smile mouth, slightly raised eyebrows
emotions.sad: downturned mouth, dot eyes looking down
emotions.surprised: round O-shaped mouth, wide dot eyes
emotions.crying: downturned mouth, tear drops from eyes

poses.embracing: two stickmen with arms around each other

anime_style.base: Detailed anime-style background, Ghibli-inspired, warm colors, slice-of-life environment
anime_style.lighting: soft warm lighting, golden hour glow, gentle shadows
anime_style.color_palette: warm earth tones, soft pastels, cozy atmosphere

settings.kitchen: detailed anime-style traditional Korean kitchen with earthen jars, wooden cabinets, warm lighting through window
settings.living_room: detailed anime-style cozy living room with low wooden table, floor cushions, warm lamp light
settings.outdoor: detailed anime-style Korean village street, trees, traditional buildings, soft sunlight
settings.restaurant: detailed anime-style humble restaurant interior, wooden tables, warm tungsten lighting

overallStyle.description: 심플한 스틱맨 + 상세한 배경의 대비 스타일
overallStyle.style: Contrast collage style - simple stickman against detailed anime background

example_prompts.emotional_scene: Simple white stickman with round head, black dot eyes looking sad, small frowning mouth, sitting alone at a detailed anime-style wooden kitchen table, Ghibli-inspired soft morning light through window, warm cup of tea nearby, contrast collage style, nostalgic and contemplative atmosphere
example_prompts.reunion_scene: Two simple white stickmen embracing in emotional reunion pose, one larger one smaller, detailed anime-style humble restaurant background, Ghibli-inspired warm lighting, contrast collage style, emotional and hopeful atmosphere
example_prompts.outdoor_scene: Simple white stickman with happy curved smile, walking along detailed anime-style Korean village path, cherry blossom trees, traditional tile-roof houses in background, Ghibli-inspired warm afternoon light, contrast collage style, peaceful atmosphere
